	<div class="context noindex"> <a href="/ent.html">Arts and Entertainment</a> &gt; <a href="A0150212.html">Music</a></div>

    <h1 class="level1" id="top10vinylalbums2008">Top 10 Vinyl Albums, 2014</h1>
	<p align="center">The following table lists the rank, title, artist, and U.S. sales data for the top ten selling vinyl albums of 2014.</p>

    <div align="center">
      <!--BodyText-->
      <br />
    </div>
  <div align="center">
  <style type="text/css">
table.tableizer-table {border: 1px solid #CCC; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;} .tableizer-table td {padding: 4px; margin: 3px; border: 1px solid #ccc;}
.tableizer-table th {background-color: #104E8B; color: #FFF; font-weight: bold;}
</style>
        
  <table class="tableizer-table">
    <tr class="tableizer-firstrow">
  <th align="left" style="font-size:13px" valign="top">Rank&nbsp;Title, Artist</th>
		  <th align="center" valign="top">Units Sold</th>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;1. <i>Lazaretto,
          </i>Jack White</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">49,100</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;2. <i>AM,</i>
           Artic Monkeys</td>
		   <td align="center" valign="top">25,100</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;3. <i>Morning Phase,</i>
          Beck</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">21,300</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;4. <i>Turn Blue, </i> The Black Keys</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">21,000</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;5. <i>Born to Die, </i> Lana Del Rey</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">16,500</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;6. <i>Legend,</i> Bob Marley and the Wailers</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">13,000</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;7. <i>Abbey Road,</i> The Beatles</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">12,600</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;8. <i>Pure Heroine,</i> Lorde</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">12,400</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;9. <i>Salad Days,</i> Mac DeMarco</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">11,900</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">10. <i>St. Vincent,</i> St. Vincent</td>
		  <td align="center" valign="top">11,400</td>
        </tr>
      </table>

      Nielsen Media Research.</div>

    <div class="context noindex"><a href="/us.html">United States</a> &gt; <a href="/ipa/A0108476.html">U.S. Cities</a></div>

          type="text/css" /> 

    
<h1 class="ftitle">Ten Best U.S. Concert Venues, 2015</h1>
  
    <div class="center">
      <p style="text-align:left">Complied by <i>USA TODAY</i>, here are the top ten best places to see a concert in the United States. Location of each venue is also listed.</p>

      <table border="1" class="sgmltable" id="A0763916">
        <tr>
          <th align="left" style="font-size:13px" valign="top">Rank</th>

          <th align="left" style="font-size:13px" valign="top">Venue</th>

            <th align="left" style="font-size:13px" valign="top">Location</th>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">1.</td>

          <td align="left" valign="top">
           Red Rocks Amphitheater
          </td>

            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108505.html">Denver</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">2.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
            The Ryman Auditorium
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108564.html">Nashville</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">3.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">
           Bank of New Hampshire Pavilion at Meadowbrook
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                Gilford, <a href="/us-states/new-hampshire.html">N.H.</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">4.</td>

          <td align="left" valign="top">
            Madison Square Garden
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108570.html">New York</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">5.</td>

          <td align="left" valign="top">
           Fenway Park
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108487.html">Boston</a>            </td>

        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">6.</td>

          <td align="left" valign="top">
           The Gorge Amphitheater
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                Quincy, <a href="/us-states/washington.html">Wash.</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">7.</td>

          <td align="left" valign="top">
            Greek Theatre
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                Berkeley, <a href="/us-states/california.html">Calif.</a>            </td>

        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">8.</td>

            <td align="left" valign="top">
                Hollywood Bowl
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top"><a href="/ipa/A0108549.html">Los Angeles</a></td>
         
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">9.</td>

         <td align="left" valign="top">
            The Tabernacle
          </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108481.html">Atlanta</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td align="left" valign="top">10.</td>
<td align="left" valign="top">Circuit of the Americas / Austin360 Amphitheater </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
                <a href="/ipa/A0108483.html">Austin</a>            </td>
        </tr>

        
      </table>
    </div>
<div class="source center"> <i>Source</i>: <a href="http://usatoday.com">USA Today</a>, 2015</div>
    <br />

	<div class="context noindex"> <a href="/ent.html">Arts and Entertainment</a> &gt; <a href="A0150212.html">Music</a></div>

   <!--BodyText-->
<h1 class="ftitle">Top Ten Highest-Grossing Concert Tours</h1>
    
	<p>The following table lists name of the tour, artist, years, and actual gross, not adjusted for inflation.</p>
 
    <!--BodyText-->
 
    <div class="center">
      <table class="sgmltable centered" id="toptensellingalbums" border="1">
        <tbody>
        
        <tr>
 
         <th>Rank</th><th>Artist</th><th>Tour Name</th>
         <th>Gross (Not Adjusted for Inflation)</th>
            <th>Tour Dates</th>
         </tr>
         
         <tr><td>1. </td>
         <td>U2</td>
         <td>U2 360° Tour</td>
         <td>$736,421,584</td>
         <td>2009-11</td>
         </tr>

         <tr><td>2.</td>
         <td>The Rolling Stones</td>
         <td>A Bigger Bang Tour</td>
         <td>558,255,524</td>
         <td>2005-07</td>
         </tr>

         <tr><td>3.</td>
         <td>Roger Waters</td><td>The Wall Live</td>
        <td>458,673,798</td>
             <td>2010-13</td>
         </tr>


        <tr><td>4.</td>
            <td>AC/DC</td><td>Black Ice World Tour</td>
            <td>441,121,000</td>
            <td>2008-10</td>
        </tr>


        <tr><td>5.</td>
            <td>Madonna</td><td>Sticky & Sweet Tour</td>
            <td>408,000,000</td>
            <td>2008-09</td>
        </tr>

        <tr><td>6.</td>
            <td>U2</td><td>Vertigo Tour</td>
            <td>389,047,636</td>
            <td>2005-06</td>
        </tr>

        <tr><td>7.</td>
            <td>The Police</td><td>The Police Reunion Tour</td>
            <td>362,000,000</td>
            <td>2007-08</td>
        </tr>

        <tr><td>8.</td>
            <td>Bruce Springsteen</td><td>Wrecking Ball World Tour</td>
            <td>355,600,000</td>
            <td>2012-13</td>
        </tr>

        <tr><td>9.</td>
            <td>The Rolling Stones</td><td>Voodoo Lounge Tour</td>
            <td>320,000,000</td>
            <td>1994-95</td>
        </tr>

        <tr><td>10.</td>
            <td>The Rolling Stones</td><td>Licks Tour</td>
            <td>311,000,000</td>
            <td>2002-03</td>
        </tr>

      </tbody></table>
 
</br>
 
      <div class="source"><i>Source:</i> Billboard</div>
